page.title: 05A Schoolday in 1985
page.content: We enter{Whitwell Primary School}at 0855 .We take our trays and sit down in our places.As it is a Thursday we go swimming at{Creswell Swimming {Baths}at 9.30,and come back at about 11.00 and normally do{Peak {Mathematics.}We have lunch at 1155. Normally 28 people stay for school lunch,3 of whom have free dinners. 3 children bring sandwiches and one goes home.After lunch we have playtime until 1300. We can play padder tennis during playtimes. In the afternoon we have our Headteacher Mr. Ray for{Art or{Creative Writing.}At 1415 we have playtime until 1430. After playtime we do{English}until 1455 when two classes combine for{Singing}in the hall. With Mr Taft or Mr. Nolan. We sing for half an hour then put our chairs up ready to leave at 1530. About twenty pupils stay after school to{Gym Club.
